Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_01.Text: *: Wanderer, thou findest thyself in the mighty walled city of Cantlin.
*: Though, if so moved, the Lord of the Underworld could surely tear down these battlements as a child teareth parchment...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_01.Text: *: The Lord of the Underworld is truly slain? Verily, thou art mighty indeed!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_01.Text: *: Zzz... Zzz... Welcmmm... Mmm... Welcome... (snort) Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_01.Text: *: Zzz... Mmm? Whence issueth such radiance...? Ah, 'tis surely but a dream... Mmm... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320_01.Text: *: Yea, the people do live in such terror of the Lord of the Underworld's wrath that they are become cowed and listless.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_01.Text: *: Hail, hero! Pray, make haste unto the king! His Majesty awaiteth thy coming most eagerly!
*: Hail, hero! Pray, make haste unto the king! His Majesty awaiteth thy coming most eagerly!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_01.Text: *: Ah-phew... Ah-phew... Ach! Put out the light! It burneth mine eyes...

*: Light...? Can it be...? Hath the dawn come at last...?
Then the Lord of the Underworld is vanquished! O happy day!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520_01.Text: *: Whilst in Cantlin, thou mayst hear of a strange tale or two.
*: One such story concerneth a group of Rubiss's devotees said to reside somewhere beyond the mountains to the south.
*: Should thou wishest to learn more, the priest in the shrine down there will doubtless be able to enlighten thee.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_01.Text: *: Once more, Alefgard basketh in the blessed light of the heavens! Lo, its warmth doth nurture and give us succour.
*: Thanks unto thee, hero! No finer vessel could the Goddess have chosen!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_01.Text: *: If thou wouldst fain cross over unto the great fiend's isle, thou wilt require three objects.
*: Seek thee the Sunstone, the Staff of Rain and the Sacred Amulet.
*: When thou possessest all three, get thee to the great Sanctum on the south-eastern isle. There wilt thou find thy way.
*: Keep in mind what I have imparted upon thee, and thou shalt not falter.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_01.Text: *: Thine efforts have brought light back unto the land of Alefgard.
*: Now the life of this world may begin anew.
*: But 'twill not thrive without the sweat of the brows of great heroes. Thine aid is yet needed. I beg of theeâ€”do not forsake us.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_01.Text: *: O benevolent Goddess! Thy will hath been done by <IfSolo(this,these)>, thy humble servant<IfSolo(,s)>! Let all men give thanks unto Thee!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0710_0.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Out_GROUND_3_1.Text: Why don't you go and show the bard in Cloudsgate Citadel what you just got?

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120.Text: *: I seek to find the means by which a being created through artifice might be animated.
*: Then shall I construct a mighty statue, that it might be employed to guard the town.
*: Yea, and its name shall be called <6>golem<9>, and it shall echo throughout the ages!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: I had thought to create a great statue, that it might be brought to life in order to protect the town.
*: But, praise be, such protection as it would provide is no longer needed.
*: 'Tis a pity that the name of <6>golem<9>, by which I would have called it, shall go unused, but this is a trifling price to pay for peace.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220.Text: *: To what end should we till the fields? We shall surely be slaughtered ere harvest time. It mattereth not what we do...
*: Especially when even the great Ortega was powerless to call forth the winds of change...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: From the bottom of my heart, I do thank thee. Thou hast brought the dawn at last!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320.Text: *: Alas and alack... Though he was born into this world but yesterday...
*: Our poor and wretched child. Oh, how will you fare against life's many hardships?
*: What is more, since a chance meeting with a warrior named Ortega, he hath been musing on the possibility of someday wielding a blade.
*: Oh, Goddess... Pray watch over my boy...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310.Text: *: Lo...the light! Never have I seen it so bright... 'Tis like unto a dream!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420.Text: *: One look was all it took to know how mighty a warrior thou art. Pray tell, how many monsters hast thou slain?
*: One look was all it took to know how mighty a warrior thou art. Pray tell, how many monsters hast thou slain?
*: One look was all it took to know how mighty a warrior thou art. Pray tell, how many monsters hast thou slain?
*: One look was all it took to know how mighty a warrior thou art. Pray tell, how many monsters hast thou slain?
*: Mayhap I too will one day be strong enough to engage them in combat... Though, I cannot imagine ever being as strong as that other great warrior.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410.Text: *: Zzz... Galen... Please... I beg of thee... Another tale... Hee hee... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Shop02_2F_RotoSword_02_.Text: *: Ah, does that sword perchance take thy fancy?
*: Scant is known about it save for the fact it was created long, long ago. Even the metal used to craft it is an absolute mystery.
*: I had at a point considered using it in the construction of the great statue I seek to animate, but it was not to be.
*: Should thou wishest to take it, then relieve me of the object by all means. I have no use of it now.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Hotel_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_.Text: *: Thanks unto thee, traveller! Our inn may trade freely once more!
*: Lo, I must prepare! <6>Good morrow, Sir!<9> <6>Good morrow, Madam!<9> Heh heh.
*: <6>I trust that thou hast slept most soundly, and will now pay handsomely for thy lodging?<9>
*: Yea, the coming of dawn is a great occasion indeed!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Hotel_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_.Text: Well met, friend! ...Who standeth before thee, thou askest? Why, 'tis I<--->Galen! The doughty bard of wide renown!
Mine instrument? Why, 'tis of course the lyre! But, alas, my most precious harp of all languisheth in the home of my much-missed mother and father.

Though beautiful indeed, the sound of my beloved Lyre of Ire doth seem to irk the monsters of the wild most fiercely!
Thus was I compelled to go abroad without it.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_Hotel_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_.Text:
Friend, I have come to a most momentous decision<--->no longer shall I roam.
I mean to return unto those from whose loins my genius did spring.

And once home, I shall compose an epic telling the tale of thy most heroical deeds.
'Twill be a song to end them all! A song to make the rest seem mere ditties!

Txt_Talk_Mercado_BattleRoad_Arena_SUB_0_.Text: *: Welcome ye to the monster arena! Today, the victor of the rank-8 tourney is to be decided!
*: Welcome ye to the monster arena! Today, the victor of the rank-9 tourney is to be decided!
*: Hark, the time is nigh for the initial bout to commence! Competitors, prithee take your places!
*: Are ye ready? Then, engage!
*: The challenger has emerged triumphant in bout number {VALUE}!
*: Needs must we proceed forthwith to bout number {VALUE}! Competitors, prithee take your places!
*: Hear ye! The final bout of this tourney is poised to begin!
*: Should both teams fight with all their might and main, then 'twill be spectacle indeed...
*: Competitors, prithee take your places!
*: The final bout of the rank-8 tourney is set to begin! Avert not your eyes, lest ye miss a defining twist or critical juncture!
*: Are ye ready? Then, engage!
*: Lo, the challenger, brave and fair, is defeated!
*: {LEADER}'s team has failed to conquer the rank-8 tourney, falling in bout {VALUE}!
*: Cease combat! A victor has emerged in the rank-8 tourney... 'Tis a magnificent triumph for the challenger!
*: To the winner of rank 8, the right to enter the rank-9 tourney is bestowed!
*: I bid ye raise your cups in honour of all our combatants' courage and endeavour!
*: Yea, the tourney has drawn to a close. But be not dismayed, for more thrilling combat awaits in the next tourney!
*: The challenger has emerged triumphant in bout number {VALUE}!
*: Needs must we proceed forthwith to bout number {VALUE}! Competitors, prithee take your places!
*: Hear ye! The final bout of this monster arena tourney is poised to begin!
*: Should both teams fight with all their might and main, then 'twill be spectacle indeed...
*: Competitors, prithee take your places!
*: The final bout of the rank-9 tourney is set to begin! Avert not your eyes, lest ye miss a defining twist or critical juncture!
*: Are ye ready? Then, engage!
*: Lo, the challenger, brave and fair, is defeated!
*: {LEADER}'s team has failed to conquer the rank-9 tourney, falling in bout number {VALUE}!
*: Cease combat! A victor has emerged in the rank-9 tourney... 'Tis a magnificent triumph for the challenger!
*: To the winner of rank 9, the right to enter the rank-10 tourney is bestowed!
*: I bid ye raise your cups in honour of all our combatants' courage and endeavour!
*: Yea, the tourney has drawn to a close. But be not dismayed, for more thrilling combat awaits in the next tourney!
My, how you've progressed! I always knew you had it in you. Well, think you can beat my menagerie of monsters?
That was a smashing performance! There's no doubt in my mind that you'll be a monster arena master soon enough!
Ho ho ho! An admirable attempt. But if you want to beat me, you'll have to train a little harder first.

Txt_Talk_Mercado_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: Should my beloved happen to find me here, in this pit of sin and violence, her wrath would wax hot at my grave transgression!
*: Prithee enjoy the day's revelry and good cheer!
*: Fatherrr! O, Father, where art thou? Mother calleth thee home to her!
*: Rumours abound that a team of great renown will do battle in the next match. 'Twould be unconscionable not to witness such bloodshed with mine own eyes!
*: Rumours abound that a team of monsters great in stature will do battle in the next match. Apparently, they wield a bevy of breath attacks most fearsome to boot!

*: Rumours abound that a team of fiends most vile will do battle in the next match. Doubtless, they will make abundant use of the Thwack incantation; verily, one shudders at the very thought of facing such foes...
*: Verily, the blood doth pump most powerfully through my veins when the beasts do battle below!
*: Falter ye not! If thou fearest attacks most damaging, simply add a monster well versed in healing magic to your team and rally anew!
*: Oh, such wailing, such gnashing of teeth, such unrelenting aggression! Verily, the wait till the next battle commenceth shall be most hard to bear.
